data.title: Let's Get Started
data.instruction: Read the question and click on the correct answer.
data.subject: English
data.question: 3.  He is known as:
data.option1: 1|The leader of the British Suffragette Movement
data.option2: 0|The first African-American to be nominated for Vice President of the United States.
data.option3: 0|The first African-American president of the United States.
data.option4: 0|The first woman to run for president of the United States.
